source.simulation¶

This module contains the simulation class.

Module Contents¶

Classes¶

Simulation

Create a simulation object.
class source.simulation.Simulation(mdl, ctrl, base, name='sim', print_opts=True)[source]¶

Create a simulation object.

Each simulation has a control module and a plant module.

Parameters

  • mdl (mdl) – drive model

  • ctrl (ctrl) – control model

  • base (base) – base values

  • name (str, optional) – name for the simulation instance

simulate(self)[source]¶

Run the main simulation loop.

post_process(self)[source]¶

Execute post simulation processes for the saved simulation data.

print_control_config(self)[source]¶

Prints the control system data, speed reference and load reference.

print_model_config(self)[source]¶

Print the model configuration data.

print_simulation_profile(self)[source]¶

Print the simulation profiles.

plot_figure(self, save=False)[source]¶

Plot the simulation results.

A wrapper for the plot function in helpers.py.

save_mat(self)[source]¶

Save the simulation data to MATLAB .mat file.
